snippet: A man came to the defense of a woman being beaten by another man, and paid with his life.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column on makeshift tribute that has appeared on Manhattan's East Fifth Street in tribute to popular neighbor Corey Capers, stabbed to death after defending a woman who was being beaten at a party; suspect Carl Knox remains at large.
lead_paragraph: A man came to the defense of a woman being beaten by another man, and paid with his life.

headline.seo: Corey Capers, Stabbing Victim, Remembered, as a Suspect Vanishes
headline.main: A Dead Father Remembered by Many, and a Stabbing Suspect Known to Few
headline.print_headline: A Dead Father Remembered by Many, and a Stabbing Suspect Known to Few
